From 29 January to 14 March 2016: Disney Parks pledged to donate $5 to the Make-A-Wish foundation for every ear photo shared online.
The: ShareYourEars donation drive had specific limitations, including a time frame (29 January 2016 through 14 March 2016) and a financial cap of $1 million. Once the donations reached this limit, the campaign would end, making only 200,000 participants eligible for participation.
Both Disney Parks and the Make: A-Wish foundation promoted the #ShareYourEars campaign on Facebook, confirming its existence and purpose.
